definition: to break out of an eggshell/to molt/to remove the husk/to shell
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
lit. the cicada sheds its carapace (idiom); fig. to vanish leaving an empty shell/a crafty escape plan

sentences.english: This paper studied on oat oil from deshelled oat seeds by petroleum ether extraction.
sentences.chinese: 本課題以脫殼燕麥爲原料，經石油醚提取得到燕麥油。

sentences.english: Moulting usually takes place in the protected moist environment of their burrows.
sentences.chinese: 它們總是選擇安全且潮溼的地洞來完成脫殼。

sentences.english: The Full Belly Project also has a pedal-powered sheller.
sentences.chinese: 溫飽工程也有一種踏板動力脫殼機。

sentences.english: The adoption of the large diameter rubber roll has raised the hulling ratio and reduced the breakage ratio.
sentences.chinese: 選用大輥徑膠輥，提高了脫殼率降低了破碎率。

sentences.english: The paper probes into the processing conditions for the decortication of rapeseed.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗室基礎上，對油菜籽脫殼工藝條件進行了研究。

sentences.english: In one hour it can shell about fifty-six kilograms of peanuts.
sentences.chinese: 這種脫殼器在一小時之內可以給56公斤花生脫殼。

sentences.english: In one hour it can shell about fifty-six kilograms of peanuts.
sentences.chinese: 這種脫殼器在一小時之內可以給56公斤花生脫殼。

sentences.english: The means of rough processing for small grains are mainly divided into shelling and sorting.
sentences.chinese: 小雜糧粗加工主要包括脫殼和分選過程。

sentences.english: The shape system of Chu-Jiu is simple, which is major cereal husking tool.
sentences.chinese: 杵臼形制簡單，是主要的穀物脫殼工具。

sentences.english: The design of control system for hydraulic sheller with twin working places was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了液壓式二工位型殼脫殼機的控制系統設計。

sentences.english: The causes of shell hulling have been found through experiment.
sentences.chinese: 通過試驗，找出殼法制芯脫殼的原因。

sentences.english: The release of infectious nuclear acid from the viral coat is called uncoating.
sentences.chinese: 病毒的感染性核酸從外殼中脫出，叫做脫殼。

definition: to seem almost genuine/easily mistaken for the real thing
giant Amazon snail (Ampullaria gigas spix), that has devastated rice paddies in China since its introduction in the 1980s
